Schattenwandler von Trostweit (Age of Sigmar) [1,490pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Stormcast Eternals) [1,490pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [340pts]

      • Lord-Arcanum on Gryph-charger [200pts]

        Selections: 0. Deathly Aura, 2. Celestial Blades, 3. Savage Loyalty, 6. Stormcaller, Aetherstave, General, Razor Beak and Claws

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, ORDER, HERO, WIZARD, STORMCAST ETERNALS, SACROSANCT, GRYPH-CHARGER, Leader, LORD-ARCANUM, General

        Command Abilities: Soul Energy, Command Trait: Deathly Aura, Magic: Lord-Arcanum on Gryph-charger, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Celestial Blades, Healing Light, Mystic Shield, Stormcaller, Unit: Lord-Arcanum on Gryph-charger, Unit Abilities: Aethereal Strike, Cycle of the Storm, Mount, Prime Electrids, Ride the Winds Aetheric, Savage Loyalty, Spirit Flask, Weapon: Aetherstave, Razor Beak and Claws


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Soul Energy You can use this command ability in your hero phase, your shooting phase, or the combat phase. Hero Phase: If you use this command ability in your hero phase, pick a friendly unit of Evocators within 6" of this model. That unit can automatically cast Empower in that hero phase (no casting roll is required, and the spell cannot be unbound). Shooting Phase: If you use this command ability in your shooting phase, pick a friendly unit of Castigators within 6" of this model. You can use Aetheric Channelling to increase the accuracy and power of that unit’s Thunderhead Greatbows in that shooting phase instead of choosing only one of those options. Combat Phase: If you use this command ability in the combat phase, pick a friendly unit of Sequitors within 6" of this model. You can use Aetheric Channelling to increase the power of the unit’s weapons and shields in that combat phase instead of choosing only one of those options.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Deathly Aura Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of this general.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Lord-Arcanum on Gryph-charger 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Healing Light
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Celestial Blades 5If successfully cast, pick a friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL unit wholly within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with that unit’s melee weapons until your next hero phase.
        Healing Light 5If successfully cast, pick a friendly Stormcast Eternal model within 18" of the caster. Heal D3 wounds that have been allocated to that model. If the casting roll was 8+, heal D6 wounds that have been allocated to that model instead.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Stormcaller 7If successfully cast, roll a dice for each enemy unit on the battlefield. On a 6+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Lord-Arcanum on Gryph-charger 12"793+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aethereal Strike If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Gryph-charger’s Razor Beak and Claws is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Cycle of the Storm Once per turn, when a friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL model is slain within 18" of this model, instead of removing the slain model, you can heal 1 wound allocated to it. This model cannot use this ability on itself.
        Mount This model’s Gryph-charger attacks with its Razor Beak and Claws.
        Prime Electrids If this model successfully casts Arcane Bolt and it is not unbound, then the spell inflicts D3 mortal wounds instead of 1, or D6 mortal wounds instead of D3 if the casting roll was 10+.
        Ride the Winds Aetheric In your movement phase, this model can Ride the Winds Aetheric instead of moving normally. If it does so, choose the direction in which it will move, and roll 6D6. This model can move up to a number of inches equal to the result in the direction chosen, moving over terrain and other models as if it could fly. It must end the move more than 3" from enemy models – if this is impossible, it cannot move at all. This model cannot charge in a turn in which it Rides the Winds Aetheric.
        Savage Loyalty If this model is slain by wounds or mortal wounds inflicted by an attack made with an enemy unit’s melee weapons, roll a dice. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Spirit Flask Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that this model will shatter 1, 2 or 3 spirit flasks. If you do so, each unit within 3" of this model suffers 1 mortal wound for each spirit flask that was shattered. Units with 10 or more models suffer D3 mortal wounds for each spirit flask that was shattered instead. Allocate the mortal wounds to this model last of all, after allocating them to any other units that are affected.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Aetherstave Melee2"43+3+-1D3
        Razor Beak and Claws Melee1"33+3+-21

        Selections: 0. Soulthief, Astral Hammers

        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Soulthief Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons. At the end of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy model that was allocated any wounds caused by this weapon in that combat phase. On a 3+ that model suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Solemn Duty You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, you do not have to take battleshock tests for friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units that are wholly within 18" of that model.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Lord-Ordinator 5"594+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Arcane Engineer Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by ORDER WAR MACHINES while they are wholly within 9" of one or more friendly LORD-ORDINATORS.
        Meteoric Slam If the unmodified hit roll for two or more attacks made against the same enemy unit in the same phase with this model’s Astral Hammers is 6, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds after all of this model’s attacks have been resolved.

      • Celestar Ballista [110pts]

        Selections: Celestar Stormbolts, Sigmarite Blades

        Celestar Ballista 3"774+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bastions of Death When this unit is targeted by an enemy missile weapon, add 2 to its save rolls if it is in cover instead of 1.
        Celestar Ballista The Ballista and its crew are treated as a single model. The crew must remain within 1" of the Ballista.
        Chained Lightning If the hit roll for an attack made with a Celestar Stormbolt scores a hit, that attack inflicts D6 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Versatile Weapon Before attacking with Celestar Stormbolts, choose either the Single Shot or Rapid Fire missile weapon characteristics for that shooting attack.

    • Battleline [330pts]

      • Liberators [90pts]

        Selections: 5 Liberators, Grandhammer, Honoured Retinue, Warhammer and Shield

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, LIBERATORS, REDEEMER, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Battleline

        Battle Trait: Wise Council, Unit: Liberator, Unit Abilities: Lay Low the Tyrants, Liberator-Prime, Paired Weapons, Sigmarite Shields, Weapon: Grandhammer, Warhammer(s)


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Wise Council At the start of your hero phase, if your general is within 3" of their adjutant, roll a dice. On a 4+, you receive 1 extra command point.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Liberator 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Lay Low the Tyrants You can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit that target an enemy unit with a Wounds characteristic of 5 or more.
        Liberator-Prime The leader of this unit is a Liberator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Liberator-Prime’s melee weapon.
        Paired Weapons Each unmodified hit roll of 6 made for a model armed with either a pair or warhammers or a pair of warblades inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Sigmarite Shields You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target this unit if any models from this unit are carrying Sigmarite Shields.

      • Sequitors [120pts]

        Selections: 5 Sequitors [120pts], 2x Stormsmite Greatmace, Stormsmite Greatmace (Sequitor-Prime), Stormsmite Maul and Soulshield

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, ORDER, SACROSANCT, STORMCAST ETERNALS, SEQUITORS, REDEEMER, Other, Battleline

        Unit: Sequitor, Unit Abilities: Greatmace Blast, Sequitor Aetheric Channelling, Sequitor-Prime, Soulshields, Weapon: Stormsmite Greatmace, Stormsmite Maul


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Sequitor 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Greatmace Blast If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Stormsmite Greatmace that targets a DAEMON or NIGHTHAUNT unit is 6, that attack inflicts D3 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Sequitor Aetheric Channelling At the start of the combat phase, you must say if this unit will channel aetheric power into its weapons or its shields. If you choose its weapons, you can re-roll failed hit rolls for attacks made by this unit in that combat phase. If you choose its shields, you can re-roll failed save rolls for attacks that target this unit in that combat phase (instead of only re-rolling save rolls of 1).
        Sequitor-Prime The leader of this unit is a Sequitor-Prime. A Sequitor-Prime can replace the unit’s weapon option with a Stormsmite Greatmace, in addition to any other models in the unit that can do so. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Sequitor-Prime’s melee weapon. If a Sequitor-Prime is armed with a Stormsmite Maul and Soulshield or Tempest Blade and Soulshield, they may also carry a Redemption Cache.
        Soulshields You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target this unit if any models from this unit are carrying a Soulshield.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Stormsmite Greatmace Melee1"23+3+-12
        Stormsmite Maul Melee123+3+-1

      • Castigators [70pts]

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Castigator 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Burst of Celestial Energy If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Thunderhead Greatbow that targets a DAEMON or NIGHTHAUNT unit is 6, that attack inflicts D3 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
        Castigator Aetheric Channelling At the start of the shooting phase, you must say if this unit will increase the accuracy or the power of their Thunderhead Greatbows. If you choose accuracy, re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by this unit in that shooting phase. If you choose power, this unit’s Thunderhead Greatbows have a Rend characteristic of -2 instead of -1 in that shooting phase.
        Castigator-Prime The leader of this unit is a Castigator-Prime. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with a Castigator-Prime’s Thunderhead Greatbow.

      • Evocators on Celestial Dracolines [520pts]

        Selections: 2x 3 Evocators on Celestial Dracolines [520pts], Tempest Blade and Stormstave

        Categories: CELESTIAL, HUMAN, ORDER, SACROSANCT, STORMCAST ETERNALS, WIZARD, CORPUSCANT, DRACOLINE, Other, EVOCATORS

        Magic: Evocators, Spell: Empower, Unit: Evocators, Unit Abilities: Celestial Lightning Arc, Evocator-Prime, Evocators, Mount, Supernatural Roar, Thunderous Pounce, Weapon: Tempest Blade and Stormstave


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Evocators 1/1Empower
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Empower 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly REDEEMER or SACROSANCT unit wholly within 12" of the caster. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll failed wound rolls for attacks made by that unit.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Evocators 12"584+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Celestial Lightning Arc You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks made with missile weapons that target this unit. In addition, after this unit has been picked to fight for the first time in a phase, after all of its attacks have been resolved, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit. If you do so, roll 2 dice for each model in this unit. For each 4+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Evocator-Prime The leader of this unit is an Evocator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of an Evocator-Prime’s melee weapons.
        Evocators A unit of Evocators is a WIZARD while it has 2 or more models. It cannot attempt to cast any spells other than Empower, but any number of units of EVOCATORS can attempt to cast Empower in the same hero phase.
        Mount This unit’s Celestial Dracolines attack with their Monstrous Claws.
        Supernatural Roar Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units when they are within 3" of one or more friendly DRACOLINES.
        Thunderous Pounce You can re-roll charge rolls for this model. In addition, the Damage characteristic for this model's Monstrous Claws is D3 instead of 1 if this model made a charge move in the same turn.

      • Gryph-Hounds [120pts]

        Selections: 6 Gryph-Hounds [120pts], Beak and Claws

        Categories: CELESTIAL, GRYPH-HOUNDS, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Other

        Unit: Gryph-Hounds, Unit Abilities: Darting Attacks, Gryph-Hound Alpha, Loyal Companion, Warning Cry, Weapon: Beak and Claws


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Gryph-Hounds 9"36-
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Darting Attacks Each time this unit attacks, it can make a 6" retreat move after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Gryph-Hound Alpha If a unit of Gryph-hounds has 3 or more models, one Gryph-hound can be a Gryph-hound Alpha. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Gryph-hound Alpha’s Beak and Claws.
        Loyal Companion Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Beak and Claws while this unit is wholly within 6" of a friendly LORD-CASTELLANT or LORD-VERITANT.
        Warning Cry If a reserve enemy unit is set up on the battlefield for the first time within 10" of this unit, friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL units wholly within 9" of this unit can attack that reserve unit with all of the missile weapons they are armed with. A unit that uses this ability to attack a reserve unit cannot use this ability to attack another reserve unit in the same phase.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Anvils of the Heldenhammer, Stormkeep

          Battle Trait: Mortal Auxilliaries, No True Death, Shield of Civilisation, Stormhosts, Command Abilities: Heroes of Another Age


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Mortal Auxilliaries 1 in every 4 units in a Stormkeep army can be a CITIES OF SIGMAR unit. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of those units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly LIBERATORS unit. In addition, when you pick a unit to benefit from a command ability from Battletome: Stormcast Eternals, you can treat those units as if they were STORMCAST ETERNALS units.
        No True Death You can re-roll failed battleshock tests for friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER units.
        Shield of Civilisation Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly LIBERATORS units. In addition, at the end of your movement phase, you can pick any friendly LIBERATORS units that
        did not move and were not set up in that phase and say they will stand fast. If you do so, until your next movement phase, you can add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by those units, and you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target those units.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Heroes of Another Age You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER unit wholly within 9" of a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO that is a general. That unit can attack with all of the missile weapons it is armed with, or make a pile-in move and attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Realm of Origin

      • Realm of Origin

        Selections: Origin: Shyish

        Categories: Realm of Origin

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
